slides.text_to_tts: Самый разыскиваемый хакер в истории. Его история изменила мир кибербезопасности.
slides.z_image_prompt: cinematic photograph of a solitary hooded hacker figure, centered, dramatically lit from behind creating a silhouette effect. The figure stands out clearly against a dark blurred background with subtle blue digital elements. Clear separation between subject and background. Superimposed at the TOP of the image in a bold, glitched font: 'КТО ОН?' -- moody, atmospheric, dark, cinematic, high contrast

slides.text_to_tts: Кевин Митник – цифровой призрак 80-х и 90-х. Он взламывал NORAD, Sun Microsystems, Motorola.
slides.z_image_prompt: dynamic close-up of a single vintage computer terminal screen displaying rapidly scrolling green code, with a subtle reflection of a shadowy, anonymous face on the screen. The terminal is the clear focal point, distinct against a softly blurred dark room background. -- retrofuturistic, intense, enigmatic, cinematic, dark ambient

slides.text_to_tts: ФБР охотилось за ним годами. Он менял личности, прятался, продолжая цифровые атаки.
slides.z_image_prompt: dramatic photograph of a single pair of hands typing rapidly on a glowing keyboard in a dark room, with a subtle sense of urgency and concealment. The hands and keyboard are the clear focal point, well-defined against a softly blurred, almost abstract background of city lights or digital patterns. -- intense, suspenseful, dark, cinematic, mysterious

slides.text_to_tts: В 1995 году, после долгих преследований, его наконец поймали. Он стал символом хакерского движения.
slides.z_image_prompt: close-up, high-contrast shot of a single pair of metallic handcuffs dramatically dropped onto a keyboard, capturing the moment of capture. The handcuffs are the clear main object, sharply focused against a softly blurred, dark desk background. -- stark, impactful, dramatic, cinematic, high contrast

slides.text_to_tts: От киберпреступника до консультанта. Его история – предупреждение и вдохновение. Хочешь узнать больше? Подпишись!
slides.z_image_prompt: professional and authoritative portrait of a solitary, well-dressed male figure (representing a cybersecurity expert), looking directly at the viewer with confidence. The figure is the clear focal point, well-defined against a clean, modern, slightly blurred background of abstract digital lines or a data center. -- confident, professional, modern, inspiring, cinematic
